tool_description: Evaluates supplier performance based on delivery timeliness, product quality, pricing competitiveness, and service reliability.

supplier_name.description: Specific supplier to evaluate, or leave null for all suppliers

weight_delivery.description: Weight for delivery performance in overall score (0-1)

weight_quality.description: Weight for quality performance in overall score (0-1)

weight_pricing.description: Weight for pricing competitiveness in overall score (0-1)

weight_service.description: Weight for customer service in overall score (0-1)

error_messages: Supplier not found: The specified supplier_name does not exist in the system.
Invalid evaluation period: evaluation_period_days must be between 30 and 365 days.
Invalid weight values: All weight parameters must be between 0 and 1, and should sum to 1.0 for meaningful results.
Insufficient performance data: Not enough historical data available for the specified evaluation period.
usage: Specify supplier name for individual evaluation or leave null for all suppliers. Set evaluation period and adjust weighting factors based on business priorities. Weights should sum to 1.0 for balanced scoring.

recommendations.description: Actionable recommendations for each supplier relationship
